item.title: Google study shows LLMs abandon correct answers under pressure, threatening multi-turn AI systems
item.description: A DeepMind study finds LLMs are both stubborn and easily swayed. This confidence paradox has key implications for building AI applications.

item.title: Mistral’s Voxtral goes beyond transcription with summarization, speech-triggered functions
item.description: Mistral's open-source speech model Voxtral can recognize multiple languages, understand spoken instructions and also offer enterprise security.

item.title: OpenAI, Google DeepMind and Anthropic sound alarm: ‘We may be losing the ability to understand AI’
item.description: Scientists from OpenAI, Google, Anthropic and Meta unite in rare collaboration to warn that a critical window for monitoring AI reasoning may close fo...

item.title: Mira Murati says her startup Thinking Machines will release new product in ‘months’ with ‘significant open source component’
item.description: Backed by $2B and with OpenAI’s open-weight model now in limbo, Thinking Machines could capture developer attention and interest.

item.title: Finally, a dev kit for designing on-device, mobile AI apps is here: Liquid AI’s LEAP
item.description: LEAP addresses those needs head-on with a local-first approach that allows small models to run directly on-device, no cloud infrastructure.
